type.name: org.gradle.api.publish.ivy.IvyConfiguration
type.description: A configuration included in an IvyPublication, which will be published in the ivy descriptor file generated.

method.name: extend
method.description:
Add the name of a configuration that this configuration extends. The extend value can use the following wildcards:
  • * - all other configurations
  • *(public) - all other public configurations
  • *(private) - all other private configurations

param:configuration The extended configuration name

method.name: getExtends
method.description:
The set of names of extended configurations, added via #extend(String).

returns:The names of extended configurations.

property.name: extends
property.description:
The set of names of extended configurations, added via #extend(String).

returns:The names of extended configurations.
